text: I am interested in language design and reading the blog <https://craftinginterpreters.com>. Are there any examples of writing a simple language in Julia? It seems like it's metaprogramming would make it easy.

elements.text: I am interested in language design and reading the blog
. Are there any examples of writing a simple language in Julia? It seems like it's metaprogramming would make it easy.

text: The JuliaInterpreter docs do a pretty good job explaining what it does, which might be of interest: <https://juliadebug.github.io/JuliaInterpreter.jl/stable/ast/|https://juliadebug.github.io/JuliaInterpreter.jl/stable/ast/>
